pages.title: Chat Interface
pages.text: Right-click your companion to open the inventory, then click the $(bold)Chat$() button to open the AI conversation screen.$(br2)Type natural language messages and your companion will respond using an AI language model (Ollama). The companion can execute in-game actions based on your requests.

pages.title: AI Tools (20+)
pages.text: Your companion can:$(br2)$(li)Execute game commands$(li)Place/break blocks$(li)Interact with containers$(li)Craft items$(li)Search the web$(li)Scan surroundings$(li)Navigate to locations$(li)Farm, mine, chop, gather$(li)Check task status$(li)And more!
